org.forgerock.openidm.provisioner

Class Id

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openidm.provisioner.Id

  • public class Id
extends Object
    Id is a util class to work with the id property in the org.forgerock.json.resource.JsonResource interface.

    A valid ID MAY start with system and followed by the name of the end system, type of the object. The third token may be the local identifier of the object instance.

    Valid identifiers: system/LDAP/account LDAP/account system/LDAP/account/ LDAP/account/ system/LDAP/account/ead738c0-7641-11e0-a1f0-0800200c9a66 LDAP/account/ead738c0-7641-11e0-a1f0-0800200c9a66 system/Another+OpenIDM/account/http%3a%2f%2fopenidm%2fopenidm%2fmanaged%2fuser%2fead738c0-7641-11e0-a1f0-0800200c9a66 Another+OpenIDM/account/http%3a%2f%2fopenidm%2fopenidm%2fmanaged%2fuser%2fead738c0-7641-11e0-a1f0-0800200c9a66 Invalid identifiers: /system/LDAP system/account

    Version:
    $Revision$ $Date$
    See Also:
    ResourceUtil.URLParser
